snippet.title: RESIDENT EVIL | THE ARKLAY CHRONICLES : Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Resident Evil : The Arklay Chronicles (RETAC) is a PC fan game that traces the events of July 98 surrounding the Arklay Mountains.
You can play several iconic characters in original scenarios such as Kenneth Sullivan, Richard Aiken, Forest Speyer, Barry Burton and Albert Wesker (and many more) and try to discover the many secrets that hide the Spencer mansion.

The first chapter will be released on March 22 to celebrate the 26th anniversary of the Resident Evil saga.

Each new chapter will bring its share of improvement to enrich the gaming experience a little more with each update.


https://gamejolt.com/games/retac/694117


Team Bravo Discord : 
 - https://discord.gg/8MGjxWaB6R
